title: Pastoral Honey Pet: Farmer’s Hot Little Lady - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Fantasy   Harem   Historical   Romance   Shoujo   Slice of Life
tags: Adapted to Manhua   Ancient Times   Farming   Female Protagonist   Polyandry   Poor Protagonist   Poor to Rich   Reverse Harem   Transmigration
author: 念已伤
description: Liu Duo was a young girl whose grandmother sold her to four brothers with the intent to be a bride. Unwilling, she ran away the following night, only to fall unconscious while trying to get away. Unexpectedly, however, she was reborn with the spirit of a 25 year old woman, also named Liu Duo.>
